daily_reports.summary:
Auto-generated daily report.

Decisions / next steps:
- Next time, focus on a single table and a single concrete question when working with database schemas.
New follow-up tasks:
- Pick one table and one concrete question to explore (pillar: CAREER, scheduled: 2025-12-17)
wins: Made progress on Pandas tutorial - 45 minutes
Made progress on Reach out to a contact - 15 minutes
Made progress on Mindful Breathing - 5 minutes
Made progress on Digital Detox - 1 hour before bed
Made progress on Practice perspective-taking - 15 minutes
Made progress on Plan a quality time activity - 30 minutes
Made progress on Track progress - 5 minutes
Made progress on Practice self-care - 30 minutes
daily_reports.free_text: Everything i did and pretty well. Besides the database schema, there were too many database schema i didnt know what to focus on. And focusing on the sensation of breath was kind of hard and i felt it was useless.  Yes that would help confirm

new_tasks.name: Pick one table and one concrete question to explore
new_tasks.notes: Follow-up from reporting about being overwhelmed by database schemas.

nodes.name: Journaling - Reflect on the day
nodes.description: Spend 15 minutes writing about your experiences, emotions, and learnings.

nodes.name: Identify 1 area for improvement
nodes.description: Pinpoint one small area where you could have acted differently or learned something new.

nodes.name: Read a relevant article or blog post
nodes.description: Dedicate 30 minutes to reading content related to self-awareness or personal growth.

nodes.name: Codecademy - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Complete a lesson on a basic coding concept (e.g., variables, loops).

nodes.name: Solve a simple coding challenge
nodes.description: Work through a beginner-friendly coding challenge on platforms like HackerRank or LeetCode.

nodes.name: Read a coding tutorial
nodes.description: Read a short tutorial on a specific coding concept or library.

nodes.name: DataCamp - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Work through a module on data analysis fundamentals.

nodes.name: Explore a public dataset
nodes.description: Find a publicly available dataset and spend 30 minutes exploring it using a tool like Google Sheets or Excel.

nodes.name: Watch a data analysis tutorial
nodes.description: Watch a video tutorial on a specific data analysis technique (e.g., data cleaning, visualization).

nodes.name: Pandas tutorial - 45 minutes
nodes.description: Follow a tutorial on using Pandas for data manipulation and analysis.

nodes.name: Practice with a dataset
nodes.description: Load a small dataset into Pandas and practice applying different functions (e.g., filtering, sorting, grouping).

nodes.name: Read Pandas documentation
nodes.description: Spend 15 minutes reviewing the Pandas documentation for a specific function or method.

nodes.name: SQL tutorial - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Complete a lesson on SQL basics (e.g., SELECT, FROM, WHERE).

nodes.name: Practice writing SQL queries
nodes.description: Write SQL queries to retrieve data from a sample database.

nodes.name: Explore a database schema
nodes.description: Examine the schema of a database and understand the relationships between tables.

nodes.name: Brainstorm project ideas - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Generate 3-5 potential project ideas that align with your interests and skills.

nodes.name: Break down a project into smaller tasks - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Choose one project idea and break it down into smaller, manageable tasks.

nodes.name: Work on a project for 60 minutes
nodes.description: Dedicate focused time to working on one of the smaller tasks.

nodes.name: LinkedIn - Connect with 3 people
nodes.description: Connect with 3 professionals in your field on LinkedIn.

nodes.name: Reach out to a contact - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Send a personalized message to a contact, expressing interest in their work or seeking advice.

nodes.name: Attend a virtual networking event - 60 minutes
nodes.description: Participate in a virtual networking event or webinar.

nodes.name: Mindful Breathing - 5 minutes
nodes.description: Practice deep, mindful breathing to calm the nervous system.

nodes.name: Hydration - Drink 8 glasses of water
nodes.description: Ensure adequate hydration throughout the day.

nodes.name: Gentle Stretching - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Perform gentle stretches to release tension in the body.

nodes.name: Digital Detox - 1 hour before bed
nodes.description: Avoid screens (phone, computer, TV) for at least one hour before bedtime.

nodes.name: Consistent Sleep Schedule - Maintain a regular sleep-wake cycle
nodes.description: Go to bed and wake up around the same time each day, even on weekends.

nodes.name: Relaxing Bedtime Routine - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Engage in a relaxing activity before bed (e.g., reading, taking a warm bath).

nodes.name: Knee Pushups - 3 sets of 8-12 reps
nodes.description: Perform knee pushups, focusing on proper form.

nodes.name: Rest - 60 seconds between sets
nodes.description: Allow adequate rest between sets.

nodes.name: Progression - Increase reps or sets
nodes.description: Gradually increase the number of reps or sets as you get stronger.

nodes.name: Wall Pushups - 3 sets of 10-15 reps
nodes.description: Perform wall pushups to build strength.

nodes.name: Incline Pushups - 3 sets of 8-12 reps
nodes.description: Perform incline pushups using a stable surface.

nodes.name: Rest - 60 seconds between sets
nodes.description: Allow adequate rest between sets.

nodes.name: Incline Pushups - 3 sets of 8-12 reps
nodes.description: Perform incline pushups using a stable surface.

nodes.name: Decrease incline - Gradually lower the surface
nodes.description: Reduce the height of the incline to increase difficulty.

nodes.name: Rest - 60 seconds between sets
nodes.description: Allow adequate rest between sets.

nodes.name: Floor Pushups - 3 sets of 5-8 reps
nodes.description: Perform floor pushups, focusing on proper form.

nodes.name: Modify - Perform pushups with hands closer together
nodes.description: Adjust hand placement to increase difficulty.

nodes.name: Rest - 60 seconds between sets
nodes.description: Allow adequate rest between sets.

nodes.name: Diamond Pushups - 3 sets of 3-5 reps
nodes.description: Perform diamond pushups, focusing on proper form.

nodes.name: Rest - 90 seconds between sets
nodes.description: Allow adequate rest between sets.

nodes.name: Progression - Increase reps or sets
nodes.description: Gradually increase the number of reps or sets as you get stronger.

nodes.name: Box Jumps - 3 sets of 5-8 reps
nodes.description: Perform box jumps, focusing on proper form.

nodes.name: Rest - 90 seconds between sets
nodes.description: Allow adequate rest between sets.

nodes.name: Progression - Increase box height
nodes.description: Gradually increase the height of the box as you get stronger.

nodes.name: Observe social interactions - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Pay attention to how others interact in a social setting.

nodes.name: Reflect on your own social behavior - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Consider how you typically behave in social situations.

nodes.name: Identify a social skill to focus on - 5 minutes
nodes.description: Choose one specific social skill you'd like to improve.

nodes.name: Grounding Technique - 5 minutes
nodes.description: Practice grounding techniques (e.g., 5-4-3-2-1 method) to manage anxiety.

nodes.name: Positive Self-Talk - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Challenge negative thoughts and replace them with positive affirmations.

nodes.name: Exposure - Start with small social interactions - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Gradually expose yourself to social situations, starting with small, manageable interactions.

nodes.name: Listen attentively - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Focus entirely on the speaker without interrupting or formulating a response.

nodes.name: Paraphrase - Summarize what you heard
nodes.description: Repeat back what you heard in your own words to ensure understanding.

nodes.name: Ask clarifying questions - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Ask questions to gain a deeper understanding of the speaker's perspective.

nodes.name: Read fiction - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Read novels or short stories to gain insight into different perspectives.

nodes.name: Listen to podcasts - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Listen to podcasts featuring diverse voices and experiences.

nodes.name: Practice perspective-taking - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Try to imagine yourself in someone else's shoes and understand their feelings.

nodes.name: Smile and make eye contact - Throughout the day
nodes.description: Practice smiling and making eye contact with people you encounter.

nodes.name: Start a conversation - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Initiate a brief conversation with someone you don't know well.

nodes.name: Offer a compliment - 5 minutes
nodes.description: Give a genuine compliment to someone.

nodes.name: Practice active listening - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Focus on understanding the other person's perspective.

nodes.name: Express your needs clearly - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Communicate your needs and feelings assertively but respectfully.

nodes.name: Brainstorm solutions - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Work collaboratively to find mutually agreeable solutions.

nodes.name: Reach out to a loved one - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Call, text, or email someone you care about.

nodes.name: Plan a quality time activity - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Schedule time to spend with someone you value.

nodes.name: Express gratitude - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Tell someone you appreciate them.

nodes.name: Ask for input - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Solicit opinions and ideas from others.

nodes.name: Recognize and appreciate contributions - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Acknowledge and celebrate the efforts of team members.

nodes.name: Show empathy and understanding - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Demonstrate genuine care and concern for others.

nodes.name: Practice Box Breathing - 5 minutes
nodes.description: Inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds, exhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds.

nodes.name: Repeat throughout the day - As needed
nodes.description: Use box breathing whenever you feel stressed or anxious.

nodes.name: Focus on the sensation of breath - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Pay attention to the rise and fall of your chest or abdomen.

nodes.name: Record thoughts - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Write down your thoughts and feelings as they arise.

nodes.name: Identify patterns - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Review your logs to identify recurring themes or thought patterns.

nodes.name: Challenge negative thoughts - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Question the validity of negative thoughts and replace them with more realistic ones.

nodes.name: Identify cognitive distortions - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Learn about common cognitive distortions (e.g., catastrophizing, all-or-nothing thinking).

nodes.name: Challenge distorted thoughts - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Examine the evidence for and against distorted thoughts.

nodes.name: Replace distorted thoughts - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Develop more balanced and realistic thoughts.

nodes.name: Self-kindness - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Treat yourself with the same kindness and understanding you would offer a friend.

nodes.name: Recognize common humanity - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Remind yourself that everyone makes mistakes and experiences suffering.

nodes.name: Practice self-acceptance - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Accept yourself, flaws and all.

nodes.name: Define a SMART goal - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Ensure your goal is Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound.

nodes.name: Break down the goal - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Divide the goal into smaller, manageable steps.

nodes.name: Track progress - 5 minutes
nodes.description: Monitor your progress and make adjustments as needed.

nodes.name: Embrace challenges - 10 minutes
nodes.description: View challenges as opportunities for growth.

nodes.name: Learn from mistakes - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Analyze your mistakes and identify what you can learn from them.

nodes.name: Value effort - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Recognize that effort is more important than innate talent.

nodes.name: Identify coping mechanisms - 15 minutes
nodes.description: List strategies you use to cope with stress and adversity.

nodes.name: Practice self-care - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Engage in activities that promote your physical and mental well-being.

nodes.name: Seek support - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Connect with trusted friends, family members, or a therapist.

nodes.name: Mindful Movement - 20 minutes
nodes.description: Engage in gentle movement like yoga or tai chi.

nodes.name: Sensory Grounding - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Focus on sensory experiences (e.g., touch, smell, taste) to reconnect with the present moment.

nodes.name: Creative Expression - 30 minutes
nodes.description: Engage in a creative activity like drawing, writing, or playing music.

nodes.name: Self-Compassion - 15 minutes
nodes.description: Practice self-kindness and understanding when experiencing failure.

nodes.name: Reframe the failure - 20 minutes
nodes.description: Challenge negative interpretations of the failure and focus on what you learned.

nodes.name: Focus on progress - 10 minutes
nodes.description: Recognize and celebrate small steps forward, regardless of setbacks.
